connector.description: Receive logs messages using the Lumberjack protocol.

camel.source.path.host.name: camel.source.path.host
camel.source.path.host.description: Network interface on which to listen for Lumberjack

camel.source.path.port.name: camel.source.path.port
camel.source.path.port.description: Network port on which to listen for Lumberjack

camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler.name: camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler
camel.source.endpoint.bridgeErrorHandler.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler.name: camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler
camel.source.endpoint.exceptionHandler.description: To let the consumer use a custom ExceptionHandler. Notice if the option bridgeErrorHandler is enabled then this option is not in use. By default the consumer will deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern.name: camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern
camel.source.endpoint.exchangePattern.description: Sets the exchange pattern when the consumer creates an exchange. One of: [InOnly] [InOut] [InOptionalOut]

camel.component.lumberjack.bridgeErrorHa.name: camel.component.lumberjack.bridgeErrorHandler
camel.component.lumberjack.bridgeErrorHa.description: Allows for bridging the consumer to the Camel routing Error Handler, which mean any exceptions occurred while the consumer is trying to pickup incoming messages, or the likes, will now be processed as a message and handled by the routing Error Handler. By default the consumer will use the org.apache.camel.spi.ExceptionHandler to deal with exceptions, that will be logged at WARN or ERROR level and ignored.

camel.component.lumberjack.autowiredEnab.name: camel.component.lumberjack.autowiredEnabled
camel.component.lumberjack.autowiredEnab.description: Whether autowiring is enabled. This is used for automatic autowiring options (the option must be marked as autowired) by looking up in the registry to find if there is a single instance of matching type, which then gets configured on the component. This can be used for automatic configuring JDBC data sources, JMS connection factories, AWS Clients, etc.

camel.component.lumberjack.sslContextPar.name: camel.component.lumberjack.sslContextParameters
camel.component.lumberjack.sslContextPar.description: Sets the default SSL configuration to use for all the endpoints. You can also configure it directly at the endpoint level.

camel.component.lumberjack.useGlobalSslC.name: camel.component.lumberjack.useGlobalSslContextParameters
camel.component.lumberjack.useGlobalSslC.description: Enable usage of global SSL context parameters.
